attributes.action: Change the Pension rules to allow FULL section 32 buyout withdrawal conditional on reinvestment in ISA or equivalent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Private pension schemes are a TOTAL rip-off - the purchase of an annuity means the accumulated fund is LOST forever and the paltry pension granted is SUBSTANTIALLY less than the return that the same fund would generate in a building society account or an ISA.

If the government is serious about encouaging private provision for retirement, it should allow us to recover our lifetime capital from the insurance companies and thus GREATLY ease the pressure on the State Pension system.
